item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

um i got a boolean of pvp can somone tell me how id put the number the code is below

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
        if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
        return false;
    }
if(isInArea(####, ####, ####, ####)){
    isInPvp = true;
}

how would i make these 4 spaces pvp e.g

lets say this is a box of 4 squares
x 2673 y 3708 south west
x 2674 y 3708 south east
x 2673 y 3709 north west
x 2674 y 3709 north east

how would i make that box pvp
